title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. into a single CLI+REST server.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client/SDK for chatting, generating embeddings and pulling models from Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers (fetch-based) to talk with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving Chat, LLM, Embeddings and Tool interfaces backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-user, model manager, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting and markdown.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama server & models on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app (Rust+React) for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama REST API with async/await and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with dependency-injection helpers and ASP.NET Core sample.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into any channel via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models in threads.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to cache and serve Ollama models inside CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer-based process isolation and LiveView example.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Modelfiles for CodeLlama, WizardMath, Zephyr, etc.
